title.en: An Aspiration to Travel to the Hidden Land of Pemokö

text.en: Embodiment of the Three Roots, Pema Tötrengtsal,
text.en-trans: tsa sum kündü pema tö treng tsal

text.en: Together with the gatherings of heroes and ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: pawo khandrö tsok dang chepa nam

text.en: Come here unimpededly and remain
text.en-trans: dak gi mönpa drubpé pangpo ru

text.en: Witnessing me as I make this aspiration, I pray.
text.en-trans: tokmé shek la dir zhuk gong su sol

text.en: Through whatever collections of virtue I and others, all ordinary beings and noble ones,
text.en-trans: dakzhen kyé pak kün kyi dü sum du

text.en: Accumulate throughout the three times,
text.en-trans: sakpé gé tsok jinyé gyipa dang

text.en: And the power of the truth of the bodhicitta resolve ofvidyādharasandḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: rigdzin khandrö tukkyé den tob kyi

text.en: May the aim of this aspiration be quickly accomplished without impediment!
text.en-trans: mönpé dön di tokmé nyur drub shok

text.en: In this supreme meritorious realm of the people of the snow mountains,
text.en-trans: gangchen kyegü sönam zhing chok tu

text.en: Supreme among all the hidden lands blessed by Padmasambhava is
text.en-trans: pemé jin lab bé né kün kyi chok

text.en: This second Khecara, Pemokö—
text.en-trans: khachö nyipa pemo kö di yi

text.en: May we see its wondrous marvel in actuality!
text.en-trans: ngotsar nangwa ten la pebpar shok

text.en: In the environment of the essential wealth of the four elements, the ten virtues increase, and
text.en-trans: jung zhi yang chü nö kyi gé chu gyé

text.en: The grain of a good harvest and everything one could desire naturally come together.
text.en-trans: lo lek kya gyal dögu ngang gi du

text.en: Even the names of the calamities of contagious disease, strife, and war are not heard—
text.en-trans: né yam truktsö dü kyi chepa kün

text.en: May there be this constant auspiciousness!
text.en-trans: ming yang mi drak taktu shipar shok

text.en: Barbarians, savages, carnivorous wild beasts and insects and the like,
text.en-trans: lalo migö chenzen bu drang sok

text.en: With their menacing claws, fangs, and beaks, as well as
text.en-trans: chu der chewachen kyi duktsub dang

text.en: The sorcerous tricks of the local guardians, the eight classes of spirits, and the ḍākinīs—
text.en-trans: né sung dé gyé khandrö chotrul sok

text.en: May all unseen disruptive obstacles be pacified!
text.en-trans: zukmé tsub mé barché zhiwar shok

text.en: May swollen protrusions, abscesses, inflammatory diseases, elephantiasis,
text.en-trans: trang bur shu tor tsé né kang bam dang

text.en: Edema, cold natured illnesses, lymphatic disorders, and all such illnesses
text.en-trans: mu chu drangwa chuser lasokpé

text.en: Of the four elements and infectious vapors,
text.en-trans: jung zhi né dang duk lang gyünché ching

text.en: Be eliminated and all who possess ardour travel without obstruction!
text.en-trans: dönnyer chen kün gekmé dröpar shok

text.en: May the fortunate ones of snowy Tibet come together
text.en-trans: gangchen bö kyi kalden kün du zhing

text.en: And spread the essential teachings of theory and practice,
text.en-trans: shedrub tubten nyingpo darwa dang

text.en: Particularly, by the swift path of the Vajrayāna,
text.en-trans: khyepar dorjé tekpé nyurlam lé

text.en: May the hidden land be filled with male and female accomplished ones.
text.en-trans: bé né drubtob po mö gangwar shok

text.en: Whoever merely aspires to reach this place—
text.en-trans: gangzhik né dir dröpa tsam gyi mö

text.en: Their accumulated stains of misdeeds, obscurations, faults, and downfalls will be purified,
text.en-trans: dikdrib nyetung drimé tsok dak né

text.en: And by the natural blazing of experience and realisation,
text.en-trans: nyam dang tokpa ngang gyi barwa dang

text.en: May the channels, winds, and essences ripen and be liberated!
text.en-trans: tsa lung tiklé min ching drolwar shok

text.en: May the intentions of the ones who opened this hidden land, Zhepai Dorje and
text.en-trans: né di gojé zhepé dorjé dang

text.en: The mother of the victorious ones Lhachik Dorjé Kyabjé,1
text.en-trans: gyalyum lha chik dorjé kyab jé kyi

text.en: Be accomplished just as they were made.
text.en-trans: tuk kyi zhepa jizhin drubpa dang

text.en: May they both live for an ocean of eons!
text.en-trans: kalpa gyatsö bardu zhabten shok

text.en: Those prophesied by the vast multitudes of supremely secret ḍākinīs,
text.en-trans: sang chok khandro gyatsö lungtenpé

text.en: The guide, the heroes, the glorious king, the lord and his subjects,
text.en-trans: na dren pawo pal gyal jebang kün

text.en: For the time being, may all excellent things of the higher realms increase for them, and
text.en-trans: nekab ngön tö lektsok kün gyé shing

text.en: May they ultimately be liberated in the [Palace of] Lotus Light!
text.en-trans: tartuk pema ö du drolwar shok

text.en: May the hosts of ḍākinīs always offer companionship,
text.en-trans: khandro gyatsö taktu drok dzé ching

text.en: The oath-bound protectors accomplish their enlightened activities, and
text.en-trans: damchen sungmé trinlé drubpa dang

text.en: Every deed and action, just as they have been divined,
text.en-trans: jitar tsipé lé kyi jawa kün

text.en: Result only in great benefit for the teachings and beings!
text.en-trans: ten drö dön chen khonar gyurwar shok

text.en: May all the weary ones who strive to reach this place
text.en-trans: né di chok su ngalwa tenpa kün

text.en: Always be watched over and accepted by the guru and ḍākinīs, and
text.en-trans: taktu lama khandrö jezung té

text.en: The blessing of compassion enter into their hearts,
text.en-trans: tukjé jinlab nying la jukpa dang

text.en: So they naturally accomplish the benefit of this life and the next!
text.en-trans: di chi dön nam ngang gi drubpar shok

text.en: May all the invading enemies of snowy Tibet be averted
text.en-trans: trulpé né di tendrel drikpé tü

text.en: By the power of the auspicious interdependence of this emanating place, and
text.en-trans: gangchen bö kyi tamak kün dok ching

text.en: May all the beings of the land of Tibet be happy, and
text.en-trans: kyegu tamché bö zhing kyipa dang

text.en: The doctrine of the Buddha flourish and spread!
text.en-trans: tubpé tenpa dar zhing gyepar shok

text.en: May all the suffering of the three lower realms cease, and
text.en-trans: ngensong sum gyi dukngal kün ché ching

text.en: The three realms attain the perfection of Akaniṣṭha!
text.en-trans: kham sum womin zhing du jongpa dang

text.en: May the ornamented wheels of the three secrets blaze
text.en-trans: jisi namkha zepar magyurwar

text.en: For as long as space remains!
text.en-trans: sang sum gyen gyi khorlo barwar shok
